headline: Trump: JD Vance ‘a Guy That Said Some Bad Sh** About Me’
author: NationalWatch
sentences: "I'm very pleased to introduce the man with by far the best chance to defeat the radical Democrat nominee for the U.S. Senate this November," Trump told his Save America rally Saturday night in Delaware, Ohio, as he introduced Vance to his supporters.

Original Article
Vance, former President Donald Trump explained his controversial decision to back a candidate — "a fearless MAGA fighter" — that once was critical of Trump's presidential campaign in 2016.
But Trump has long maintained those former critics who get on board with his America first, Make American Great Again campaign can become his staunchest political allies.
The other top candidates in the Ohio Senate Republican primary had asked Trump to not take a side in the race, while all were vying for votes from Trump's supporters.
